Abstrak: The article presents the author's insights on the political art entitled "He Will Not Divide Us," by performance artist Shia LaBeouf and his collaborators Nastja Säde Rönkkö and Luke Turner. Topics discussed include the public safety hazard created by the installation, the need for Americans to recognize political differences to discover unity, and the statement issued by the artists without explanation about the misleading frame of their piece as a political rally instead of a participatory performance artwork.
